response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would greatly benefit you as well. Given its significance and the quality it offers, I am offering you the chance to purchase it at a special price of $900,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its true worth and provides you with an exceptional return on investment. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and hope to discuss further details with you soon. Thank you for considering this exceptional opportunity.", "product_price": 900000}
